Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: frank
Reviews.Content: The picture quality using only the amplified leaf antenna is great. The sound, however, was "tinny", and I had to add a Vizio sound bar to be able to watch Netflix through my connected Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture
Reviews.Author: G Coz
Reviews.Content: Nice picture and sound. A much brighter picture than the LCD. I've mounted both for my family members. The only thing I didn't like was that the power cord is right in line with the mounting bolts for a wall mount bracket. I had to cut part of the bracket off to install it so that it didn't stick up over the tv.

Reviews.Title: Best LED TV for the value and quality
Reviews.Author: Historian89
Reviews.Content: I recently bought the vizio 32" LED TV. The picture is very clear and brillant when watching netflix or watching a movie on it. Picture is good when watching cable but it varies with service to service company. Could use another component input jack than just one row. This is my 2nd vizio flat screen in 3 years and when I look at my older vizio which is lcd it looks dueller compared to the LED. Overall good buy and would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: 2 months.  No issues. Slam dunk
Reviews.Author: RandyK
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV for a remodel of my sons room.  Great looking picture.  The remote is a bit light weight and the sound is a bit tinny.  Considering the price of this TV those two things are easily overlooked.  This is our 3rd Visio TV and we've been happy with them all.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv to replace an old crt tv in my office. I had the cable company install an HD PVR and I was blown away by how awesome the picture was. The quality of the speakers is not the greatest and sound tinny at times so I plan to add surround sound. All in all for the price I think it is a great value.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Michael V.
Reviews.Content: Good picture, good sound, easy setup - I am happy with my purchase.It also has arrived two days before the schedule.

Reviews.Title: It's NOT 7.8" thick!
Reviews.Author: ShePointsIDig
Reviews.Content: It's only about 1.75" and when mounted on VideoSecu TV Wall Mount Flush Ultra Slim Bracket for LCD LED Flat Panel Screen Monitor TV VESA 200, 200x100, 100 ML206B 1QG, it only projects about 2.5" from the wall to the front of the set.Typical TV-set sound.  Needs some real speakers, but it's a "5" because it's so thin.

Reviews.Title: amazing product but...
Reviews.Author: consumer
Reviews.Content: love the tv. picture is amazing, sound is great. i use it in my average-ish sized room. i don't think it'll be good for living rooms unless you have a sound system. very good buy for the price. overall, everything is great and i'm very happy with my purchase.but... on a side note. my tv came with a super small, little ding or chip on the screen. its about the size of a speck of dust. you cant really see it unless you're super close. does it bother the poop out of me? hell yeah. is it gonna be a problem? 99.99% no (if later, this causes a problem. i'll be sure to edit this review) however, i don't blame amazon or the seller. i'm thinking it's most likely the manufacturer's fault. but i'm not gonna go through the trouble of throwing a fit over it and having the product replaced. but i just want to make note of it. lemme know if any of you experience similar problems.overall, i really really recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Fluff
Reviews.Content: It has a good picture and  the sound is good. I have it for our bedroom tv. When I ordered the tv it arrived in the time they said and packaged vey good. Everything was there and easy to put together and hook up.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: tfinn
Reviews.Content: everything  what i expected, great colour & picture.easy set up., looks good very slim.it arrived with everything in the box.

Reviews.Title: great television for the price with one BAD cosmetic design flaw.
Reviews.Author: John Snow
Reviews.Content: I got this television for a great price. Resolution isn't bad. They say on a smaller television it that it doesn't need 1080, but I beg to differ. I can tell the difference. I would still buy it again though for the price that I got. Vizio makes a solid television.The one BAD thing is that the HDMI connections are off to the side so your wires will not be hidden when you hook up your equipment. I can live with it in my workout and gaming room, but would not want it as my main television for this reason.The television is not that small either. 32 inches is plenty if you are on a budget or have a small space.

Reviews.Title: No problems here
Reviews.Author: Ahmad J.
Reviews.Content: Been looking around Amazon at reviews for 32' around this price range and reviews are the key things to read. Always read the bad reviews first. Most of the time they are the ones that have reviewed after testing their product. Had it since the 7/9 and so far there aren't any problems. Everything functions just fine. Keep you posted if anything happens.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding picture
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Mcpharlin
Reviews.Content: The picture on this television is wonderful - clear and bright.  The sound is absolutely fine.  It was easy to set up.  I bought it for my mother who gets her tv signal over the air.  No cable and no monthly fees.  She loves the tv.  It virtually configured itself after I plugged in the antenna cable.  I'm very happy with this tv.

Reviews.Title: very thin
Reviews.Author: Rudolf J. Weikl
Reviews.Content: i bought this tv because i needed a tv that was thin enough to mount on the wall of my travel trailer so when i close up the slide room,there is no interference.tv plays good, it could use another component output,so far so good.

ProductInfo.Features:
Edge Lit Razor LED backlighting for brilliant color and contrast
SRS StudioSound HD
JPEG photo viewer
Ambient Light Sensing technology
Meets ENERGY STAR 5.3 guidelines
ProductInfo.Name: VIZIO E321VT 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED-Lit TV
